name: azurite
description: An open source Azure Storage API compatible server

azurite.debug.description: Enable debug log into Visual Studio Code channel

azurite.silent.description: Disable access log into Visual Studio Code channel

azurite.loose.description: Enable loose mode which ignores unsupported headers and parameters

azurite.location.description: Workspace location folder path, by default Visual Studio Code current opened folder

azurite.blobHost.description: Blob service listening endpoint, by default 127.0.0.1

azurite.blobPort.description: Blob service listening port, by default 10000

azurite.queueHost.description: Queue service listening endpoint, by default 127.0.0.1

azurite.queuePort.description: Queue service listening port, by default 10001

scripts.docker:build: npm run docker:prebuild && cross-var docker build --rm -f "Dockerfile" -t xstoreazurite.azurecr.io/public/azure-storage/azurite:$npm_package_version . && cross-var docker tag xstoreazurite.azurecr.io/public/azure-storage/azurite:$npm_package_version xstoreazurite.azurecr.io/public/azure-storage/azurite:latest
scripts.docker:build:internal: npm run docker:prebuild && cross-var docker build --rm -f "Dockerfile" -t xstoreazurite.azurecr.io/internal/azure-storage/azurite:$npm_package_version . && cross-var docker tag xstoreazurite.azurecr.io/internal/azure-storage/azurite:$npm_package_version xstoreazurite.azurecr.io/internal/azure-storage/azurite:latest
scripts.test: npm run lint && mocha --compilers ts-node/register --no-timeouts --grep @loki --recursive tests/**/*.test.ts tests/**/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:blob: npm run lint && mocha --compilers ts-node/register --no-timeouts --grep @loki --recursive tests/blob/*.test.ts tests/blob/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:blob:sql: npm run lint && cross-env AZURITE_TEST_DB=mysql://root:my-secret-pw@127.0.0.1:3306/azurite_blob_test mocha --compilers ts-node/register --no-timeouts --grep @sql --recursive tests/blob/*.test.ts tests/blob/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:blob:sql:ci: npm run lint && cross-env AZURITE_TEST_DB=mysql://root:my-secret-pw@127.0.0.1:13306/azurite_blob_test mocha --compilers ts-node/register --no-timeouts --grep @sql --recursive tests/blob/*.test.ts tests/blob/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:queue: npm run lint && mocha --compilers ts-node/register --no-timeouts --recursive tests/queue/*.test.ts tests/queue/**/*.test.ts
scripts.clean: rimraf dist typings *.log coverage __testspersistence__ temp __testsstorage__ .nyc_output debug.log *.vsix
scripts.validate:npmpack:win: npm install && npm run build && npm pack && cross-var npm install -g azurite-$npm_package_version.tgz && azurite -v && azurite-blob -v && azurite-queue -v
scripts.validate:npmpack:linux_mac: npm install && npm run build && npm pack && cross-var sudo npm install -g azurite-$npm_package_version.tgz && azurite -v && azurite-blob -v && azurite-queue -v

author: Microsoft
